name: BlackGem
description:
A game made for  ScoreSpaceJam20

Movement/移动:W、A、S、D  ↑、←、↓、→

Attack/攻击：J、Mouse Left

Jump/跳跃：K、Space

Dash/冲刺：O (Need Unlock/需要解锁）

Roll/翻滚：L (Need Unlock/需要解锁）

Author/作者：

  • Art/Creative：Yansaya
  • Coding/Designer：liangxie

Game made by UnityEngine and we used some 3rd party assets/plugins/tools.

Architecture/Framework use QFramework

Level Design Tool: LDtk

Tile Editing：TileSetter

Sounds/Music used from:

  • Ultimate Sound FX
  • Ultimate Music Bundle
